title: Ghosts Demons And Shadow People
description: A collection of 50 real-life paranormal stories from all over the world.Including stories All of the stories are unique and have been collected from regular people like you and me. There are also a few pictures as "evidence" for some of the stories in the paperback version! If you are interested in the paranormal, you will most likely enjoy this book.Please scroll up and grab a copy today.
author: Clifford Anderson
